title: Aquis Microfiber Hair Turban, Lisse Crepe, Patented Design, White
description: Aquis towels are made of Aquitex, a super absorbent material woven from ultrafine microfibers.  The technology behind our microfiber towel enables water to be drawn from hair and skin more quickly and thoroughly than other towels.  And it's especially gentle on hair and skin.  Designed to be lightweight, compact and durable, Aquis towels are ideal for everyday use at home, at the gym and while traveling.

title: Mimi's Diva Dryer by Aquis Microfiber Hair Towel, Pink (19 x 39-Inches)
description: Diva Dryer is made of Aquitex.  Aquitex is a super-absorbent microfiber material that dries a girl's hair quicker than an ordinary hair towel.  Dry your hair in half the time!

title: Deva B'Leave In Curl Boost and Volumizer, 16 Ounce
description: A botanically enriched. Curl volumizer that enhances fullness and strength. Ideal for fine, delicate curls. 100% sulfate, paraben and silicone free.

title: Marianna Double Prong Metal Clips * 80 Count
description: * RUST RESISTANT FINISH * LIGHTWEIGHT, YET STRONG * STURDY SPRING-ACTION PRONGS * 80 Clips per Box

title: Deva Heaven In Hair Intense Moisture Treatment, 8 Ounce
DevaCurl One Condition (32 oz)
description: DevaCurl One Condition Ultra Creamy Instant Conditioner - Keep curls shiny and manageable with this ultra-creamy super rich conditioner. DevaCurl One Condition restores, hydrates, neutralizes odor and eliminates product residue. Scented with Lemon Grass. For all hair types. (32 oz)

title: Devacurl Spray Gel, 8.0 Fluid Ounce
description: This alcohol free, non-flaking spray gel provides maximum curl definition, lift and a crunch free hold. Spray on wet or dry curls for extra hold. Extra hold and curl retention Moisturizes, enhances and re-activates curls Enhances waves while taming frizz

title: Deva Curl Angell Hyper-Allergic Conditioning Gel 32oz
description: Moisturizing Gel to Style Your CurlsPamper your adorable curls with Deva Curl AnGEL. This light moisturizing and defining gel melts into your hair effortlessly and on drying forms a protective moisture casting so that curly locks can be styled and held in place for as long as 24-48 hours.Locks in moisture for 24-48 hours, prevents frizzHold and freezes style in placeGives volume and body to well-defined curlsWith this styling gel experience no frizzes for a long time. Boost volume and body into your curls and give it a well-defined look. Something you may've always wanted for quite some time.Just For You:Those with curly and wavy hairA Closer Look:Infused with natural botanical extracts of wheat, soy and chamomile and devoid of sulfates, silicone and paraben, Deva Curl AnGEL locks in moisture and eliminates frizz. It boosts volume and enhances curls so that they can be styled as desired.Get Started:Spray on wet or dry hair. Scrunch with fingers to evenly distribute. For high frizz factor, spray on wet hair, then again on dry hair.

title: L'Oreal Paris Couleur Experte Express Hair Color, 6.1 Light Ash Brown/French Eclair
description: Couleur Experte is the only at-home dual-system coloring kit that combines in just one box permanent base color with harmonizing highlights. Thanks to perfectly coordinated shades, you can achieve a rich, elegant, salon-like look in just two easy steps.  Color + Highlights in One.  Fast Application.  Experte Highlights.

title: Deva Curl Ultra Creamy Daily Conditioner, One Condition, 32-Ounces
description: Calling all curls. Super Rich - with the invigorating scent of lemon grass. This ultra creamy instant conditioner keeps curls shiny and manageable. For maximum effectiveness use daily. Not tested on animals. Made In USA.
